section2.txt-1: Picasso will be officially on the line on 16th January 2018.
section2.txt-2: Now register as Picasso Member to get IBT incentive.

section3.title: Advantages of Picasso
section3.txt-1: Technical team with rich experience of transaction  platform and blockchain development provides you technical assurance.
section3.txt-2: Committed to connect and integrate  resources from all exchanges through standardized technical services.
section3.txt-3: All exchanges using Picasso Technology  can share user resources to reach highter-efficiency trades, more accurate maket info and market development.
section3.txt-4: Offering a standardized platform construction  and top up services for digital transaction platforms and blockchain enterprises.
section3.title-5: Risk Sharing of various of assets
section3.txt-5: Standardized technical services and  rational integration among all exchanges promote the sharing of risks and enhance assurance.

section4.title: Picasso App
section4.txt: To experience reliable, high-efficiency and secure  digital asset transaction, please download Picasso App.

assets.title: Asset Management
assets.layer-txt: Sorry, the top up and withdrawal functions on PC are not available temporarily for the sake of guaranteeing the security of user's assets. Please go to Download Center for Picasso App
